amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section prohibiting the use of funds for any action that is related to or promotes the expansion of the boundaries or size of the Pinon Canyon Maneuver Site in southeastern Colorado.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section prohibiting the use of funds for any action that is related to or promotes the expansion of the boundaries or size of the Pinon Canyon Maneuver Site in southeastern Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Musgrave amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 383 - 34 (Roll no. 497).
